availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Edmund A. W. Roberts (Frankfort, Kentucky, attorney, notary, and farmer)

body.p: Frankfort, Kentucky, attorney, notary, and farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Cynthia A. Roberts. Father of Patrick H. Roberts, William R. Roberts, Edmund A. Roberts, Thomas Nicholas Roberts, Charles A. Roberts, Lucy Roberts, Mary Roberts, and John Roberts. Farmer in Franklin County, Kentucky, in 1850. Attorney in Frankfort in 1860. Notary public for Franklin County in 1864.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Franklin County, District 2, p. 66B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Franklin County, Frankfort, p. 91.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Franklin County, Benson, p. 26B.
KYR-0001-004-0563.
